alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Delaware County through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Margaretville, or 18 miles southeast of Delhi, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Margaretville, Fleischmanns, Arkville and Dunraven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
